game.name: GunX - Lock and Load
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, VR Only, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Get ready for the ultimate VR Gun assembling experience with PvP Duels, Zombie Campaign and a Shooting Range for perfecting your assembling speed and accuracy. Challenge your friends or join them in co-op and immerse yourself in an adrenaline-fueled fight.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Get ready for the ultimate VR Gun assembling experience with PvP Duels, Zombie Campaign and a Shooting Range for perfecting your assembling speed and accuracy. Challenge your friends or join them in co-op and immerse yourself in an adrenaline-fueled fight.
